helper
Class Helper

java.lang.Object
  helper.Helper

public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object

This class performs all database related functions as well as a few other necessary functions

Author:
Will Henry, David Sawyer

Constructor Detail

Helper

public Helper()
Empty constructor. Opens a connection to the database and sets up PreparedStatements

addSection

public boolean addSection(java.lang.String callNum,
                          java.lang.String creditHours,
                          java.lang.String instructor,
                          int courseId)
Sets a new Section

Parameters:
callNum - the call number of the section
creditHours - the amount of credit hours the course gives
title - the title of the section
instructor - the instructor of the section
courseId - the course that the section is of
Returns:
true if the Section was successfully added, false if failed

                          java.lang.String roomNumber,
                          java.lang.String buildingNumber,
                          int sectionId)
Sets a new Meeting

Parameters:
timeStart - the time of the meeting
timeEnd - the the ending time of the meeting
meetingDay - the day of the meeting
roomNumber - the instructor of the section
buildingNumber - the building number of the meeting
sectionId - the section the meeting is of
Returns:
true if the Meeting was successfully added, false if failed
